stats.strength.name: Strength
stats.strength.description:
[key.flavour.important](Strength) is responsible for damage scaling with most [key.hold_type.two_handed] [key.flag.melee] weapons and many [key.hold_type.one_handed] weapons as well.
It also affects [key.stat.stamina](Stamina Costs), [key.stat.attack.knockback] & [key.stat.resistance.knockback], [key.stat.movement.jump_height] and [key.stat.misc.carry_weight].
stats.dexterity.name: Dexterity
stats.dexterity.description: Dexterity is responsible for damage with lighter melee weapons, ranged weapons, attack speed, stamina regeneration speed and movement speed.
stats.constitution.name: Constitution
stats.constitution.description: Constitution is responsible for maximum health, maximum stamina and your heal multiplier.
stats.mind.name: Mind
stats.mind.description: Mind is responsible for your spell power, spell casting speed and concentration cost reduction.
stats.willpower.name: Willpower
stats.willpower.description: Willpower is responsible for your maximum concentration, concentration regeneration speed, and a small amount of critical resistance.
stats.luck.name: Luck
stats.luck.description: Luck affects the loot you find in the dungeon, among many other small things...
stats.health_max.name: Maximum Health
stats.health_max.description:
When your health reaches zero, you die.

So try to avoid that!
stats.health_regen.name: Health Regeneration
stats.health_regen_delay.name: Health Regeneration Delay
stats.health_regen_delay.description: The delay in seconds after taking damage before your health regeneration begins to work.
stats.heal_multiplier.name: Healing Multiplier
stats.heal_multiplier.description: The percentage multiplier for all healing you receive.
stats.stamina_max.name: Maximum Stamina
stats.stamina_max.description: Stamina is required for attacking, blocking, sprinting and jumping.
stats.stamina_regen.name: Stamina Regeneration
stats.stamina_regen_delay.name: Stamina Regeneration Delay
stats.stamina_regen_delay.description: The delay in seconds after taking an action that spends stamina before your stamina regeneration starts again.
stats.stamina_cost_multiplier.name: Stamina Cost Multiplier
stats.stamina_cost_multiplier.descriptio: Multiplies all stamina costs you pay by this value.
stats.concentration_max.name: Maximum Concentration
stats.concentration_max.description: Concentration is used to maintain buff and debuff spells. Certain spells consume it over time, others lower your maximum while they are active.
stats.concentration_regen.name: Concentration Regeneration
stats.concentration_regen_delay.name: Concentration Regeneration Delay
stats.concentration_regen_delay.descript: The delay in seconds until you start regenerating concentration once you finish expending it.
stats.concentration_cost_multiplier.name: Concentration Cost Multiplier
stats.concentration_cost_multiplier.desc: Multiplies all concentration costs you pay by this value.
stats.posture_max.name: Maximum Posture
stats.posture_max.description: Doesn't really do anything at the moment!
stats.posture_regen.name: Posture Regeneration
stats.posture_regen_delay.name: Posture Regeneration Delay
stats.posture_regen_delay.description: The delay seconds after taking posture damage until your posture begins to regenerate again.
stats.mana_max.name: Maximum Mana
stats.mana_max.description:
Mana is used to cast spells, with higher level spells costing more mana.
It does not regenerate naturally.
stats.attack_speed.name: Attack Speed
stats.attack_speed.description: The percentage multiplier for how quickly you can attack with weapons. Occasionally affects the speed at which you perform other physical actions.
stats.spell_speed.name: Spellcasting Speed
stats.spell_speed.description: The percentage multiplier for how quickly you can cast spells.
stats.move_speed_multiplier.name: Move Speed
stats.move_speed_multiplier.description: The percentage multiplier for how quickly you move.
stats.jump_height_multiplier.name: Jump Height
stats.jump_height_multiplier.description: The percentage multiplier for how high you can jump.
stats.attack_power.name: Attack Power
stats.attack_power.description: Your damage with weapons scales off your attack power. Attack power will be calculated using strength for heavy weapons and dexterity for light and ranged weapons.
stats.spell_power.name: Spell Power
stats.spell_power.description: Generic spell power. Almost all spells will scale off this in some way.
stats.fire_power.name: Fire Power
stats.fire_power.description: Fire spells will typically scale off this in higher amounts.
stats.frost_power.name: Frost Power
stats.frost_power.description: Frost spells will typically scale off this in higher amounts.
stats.electric_power.name: Electric Power
stats.electric_power.description: Electric spells will typically scale off this in higher amounts.
stats.poison_power.name: Poison Power
stats.poison_power.description: Poison spells will typically scale off this in higher amounts.
stats.necrotic_power.name: Necrotic Power
stats.necrotic_power.description: Necrotic spells will typically scale off this in higher amounts.
stats.arcane_power.name: Arcane Power
stats.arcane_power.description: Arcane spells will typically scale off this in higher amounts.
stats.divine_power.name: Divine Power
stats.divine_power.description: Divine spells will typically scale off this in higher amounts.
stats.occult_power.name: Occult Power
stats.occult_power.description: Occult spells will typically scale off this in higher amounts.
stats.heal_power.name: Heal Power
stats.heal_power.description: Healing effects will typically scale off this in higher amounts.
stats.buff_power.name: Buff Power
stats.buff_power.description: The effectivness of beneficial buffs you apply will scale off this.
stats.debuff_power.name: Debuff Power
stats.debuff_power.description: The effectiveness of detrimental debuffs you apply will scale off this.
stats.armor_penetration.name: Armor Penetration
stats.armor_penetration.description: This is subtracted from the targets armor before calculating damage.
stats.warding_penetration.name: Warding Penetration
stats.warding_penetration.description: This is subtracted from the targets warding before calculating damage.
stats.fire_penetration.name: Fire Penetration
stats.fire_penetration.description: This is subtracted from the targets fire resistance before calculating damage.
stats.frost_penetration.name: Frost Penetration
stats.frost_penetration.description: This is subtracted from the targets frost resistance before calculating damage.
stats.electric_penetration.name: Electric Penetration
stats.electric_penetration.description: This is subtracted from the targets electric resistance before calculating damage.
stats.poison_penetration.name: Poison Penetration
stats.poison_penetration.description: This is subtracted from the targets poison resistance before calculating damage.
stats.necrotic_penetration.name: Necrotic Penetration.
stats.necrotic_penetration.description: This is subtracted from the targets necrotic resistance before calculating damage.
stats.arcane_penetration.name: Arcane Penetration
stats.arcane_penetration.description: This is subtracted from the targets arcane resistance before calculating damage.
stats.divine_penetration.name: Divine Penetration
stats.divine_penetration.description: This is subtracted from the targets divine resistance before calculating damage.
stats.occult_penetration.name: Occult Penetration
stats.occult_penetration.description: This is subtracted from the targets occult resistance before calculating damage.
stats.critical_multiplier.name: Critical Multiplier
stats.critical_multiplier.description: When scoring a critical hit, it will be multiplied by this percentage.
stats.knockback.name: Knockback
stats.knockback.description:
This score represents how far you'll move an enemy when you hit them.
It is reduced by the targets knockback resistance.
stats.armor.name: Armor
stats.armor.description: All physical damage is reduced by your armor.
stats.warding.name: Warding
stats.warding.description: All magical damage is reduced by your warding.
stats.critical_negation.name: Critical Negation
stats.critical_negation.description:
Critical damage you receive have their multiplier reduced by this value.
This cannot reduce critical damage below a regular hit.
stats.knockback_resistance.name: Knockback Resistance
stats.knockback_resistance.description: Knockback you receive is reduced by this amount.
stats.fire_resistance.name: Fire Resistance
stats.fire_resistance.description: Fire damage you take is reduced by this stat.
stats.frost_resistance.name: Frost Resistance
stats.frost_resistance.description: Frost damage you take is reduced by this stat.
stats.electric_resistance.name: Electric Resistance
stats.electric_resistance.description: Electrical damage you take is reduced by this stat.
stats.poison_resistance.name: Poison Resistance
stats.poison_resistance.description: Poison damage you take is reduced by this stat.
stats.necrotic_resistance.name: Necrotic Resistance
stats.necrotic_resistance.description: Necrotic damage you take is reduced by this stat.
stats.arcane_resistance.name: Arcane Resistance
stats.arcane_resistance.description: Arcane damage you take is reduced by this stat.
stats.divine_resistance.name: Divine Resistance.
stats.divine_resistance.description: Divine damage you take is reduced by this stat.
stats.occult_resistance.name: Occult Resistance
stats.occult_resistance.description: Occult damage you take is reduced by this stat.
stats.carry_weight.name: Carry Weight
stats.carry_weight.description:
How much weight you can carry before being negatively effected.
This scales off your strength.
